author: Andrew Solender
title: How the left could win even if Democrats lose
description: If Dems lose their majority in the midterms, a strengthened left could emerge more influential in a diluted Democratic Party.
content: House progressives see a route to expanding their power over the next year, even though they're being accused of dragging down other Democrats by pushing the party's image too far left, Axios has leaâ€¦ [+3508 chars]
